title: Standard Form of Hyperbola
text: The standard form for hyperbola is either $$\frac{{\left(x-h\right)}^2}{a^2}-\frac{{\left(y-k\right)}^2}{b^2}=1$$ \\n or $$\frac{{\left(y-k\right)}^2}{a^2}-\frac{{\left(x-h\right)}^2}{b^2}=1$$ depending on the transverse axis.

title: Squaring
text: We want to square the denominator to get a and b so that we can express in the standard form.
